MAIN.title: HMT Heads Up
MAIN.body_md:
# Thank you!

Our goal at HTM it to keep workplaces as safe as possibly by making it simple for the people who work in them to report or raise any concerns immediately. You're helping us make this a better, safter place to work. We appreciate it!
